content.en:
# Conrad and the Masterpiece of Building Atmosphere

"Il Conde" by Joseph Conrad is for me a masterpiece of building scene atmosphere.

## About Conrad

There's much to say about this Polish ğŸ˜‰ writer. About his craft, that he created in his third language because he knew Polish and French best. That he described his own experiences or stories he heard. That he was a master of building varied narrative structure.

## Multisensory Experience

However, this particular story is amazing in terms of multisensory experience when it comes to the key scene. In building emotions, the writer engages not only all senses but also at some moments enters into synesthesia.

It's a lesson for every writer - how to engage all the reader's senses, how to make a scene not only visible, but also audible, sensible, tangible.
